head.citation-title: Signal Processing: Algorithms, Architectures, Arrangements, and Applications, SPA 2007 - Workshop Proceedings
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 31 papers. The topics discussed include: reduced triple modular redundancy for built-in self-repair in VLIW-processors; parallel digital signal processing using multi-issue instructions; low complexity image coding algorithm for capsule endoscopy with Bayer color filter array; LFM radar signal detection in the joint time-frequency domain; interpolation of complex dynamic trajectory for hand-written signature verification; design of eight-band oversampled linear phase paraunitary filter banks using quaternion multiplication matrices; fast filtering by generalized convolution related to discrete trigonometric transforms; LDPC code optimization for diversity reception and turbo equalization; optimization of hidden layer in a neural network used to predict bladder-cancer patient survival; digital complex sinusoidal oscillators with outputs in quadrature; and timing errors analysis of OFDM systems based on joint cyclic-prefix and postfix.

source.sourcetitle-abbrev: Signal Process.: Algorithms, Archit., Arrange., Appl., SPA - Workshop Proc.
